local new = typesys.new
local delete = typesys.delete
local GameObject = CS.UnityEngine.GameObject
local game_events = require("module/game_events")
local role_model = lua_framework.proxy.player_info_proxy
local meta = typesys.def.MassageTips {
    __super = typesys.Panel,
    btn_ok = typesys.__unmanaged,
    TextTMP = typesys.__unmanaged,
    callBack = typesys.__unmanaged,
    btn_close = typesys.__unmanaged,
}

function meta:awake()
    self:add_listeners()
end

function meta:start()
    if  self.param then
        self.callBack = self.param.Obj.callBack
    end
    
end

function meta:add_listeners()
    self.btn_ok.onClick:AddListener(function()
        if self.callBack then
            self.callBack()
        end
        GameUIManager:CloseUI("MassageTips.prefab")
    end)
    self.btn_close.onClick:AddListener(function() 
        GameUIManager:CloseUI("MassageTips.prefab")
    end)
end

function meta:destroy() 
    self:release()
end

return meta
